description:
Sai Saici`s next opponent is the Mermaid Gundam. However he is distracted as he falls in love with the pilot`s sister, Cecil.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Défaite par forfait ? Le premier amour de Sai Saici
Running Away! Sai Saici in Love
Shiai Houki!? Koi ni Dokidoki, Sai Saici
試合放棄!? 恋にドキドキ, サイ・サイシー
